post_title: Moved to eBay 1909-1911 T206 Gandil, Piedmont 350-460
post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1909-1911 T206 Chick Gandil, Chicago American, Piedmont 350-460, for sale.

Description: Nicely centered. No creases. Corner wear. The back of the card has some light diagonal stains probably from being displayed in a photo album sometime in the past.

Price: Not available

Payments accepted: Paypal F/F (Goods and services add 4%), check, or money order.

Note: First post or private message with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,
Joe
